snippet.title: Decoherence Alpha Teaser - Human Assisted Tactical Robot Arena by Efecto Studios
snippet.description:
Find more at: http://www.playdecoherence.com/
Decoherence plays like a twin-stick shooter, but is a strategy game at its core. You build custom robots using components you have collected, place these robots on the arena, configure their AI behavior and orders, and, finally, fight along them against your opponent and his/her own team of robots.

This competitive action/strategy game demands to think and plan ahead but also allows to react and improvise on the fly. These two sides of the game are not in conflict but complement each other.
